page.title: 07Changing Times
page.content:
We interviewed six people who had lived in Eltham for an average of 42 years .They had all left school at 14 and had to take any available job. During the war Eltham had been bombed a lot but people were friendly and helped one another.You could even go out and leave your front door open. The main changes they had seen were the coming of so many cars and a lack of care for the environment.They all used public transport but said it was infrequent and unreliable.They thought that most young people were alright but the general impression was created by a bad minority.
Pupils-St Thomas More School.
